title: shrIpatiyu namage
sahitya:
shrIpatiyu namage sampadavIyali


anupallavi

  vANIpatiyu namage dhIrgAyu koDali


caraNam 1    varavibudharanu poreya viSava kaNThadaliTTa hara nitya namage sahAyakanAgali 
nararoLunnatavAda nitya bhOgangaLanu puruhUta pUrNa mADisali namage
    caraNam 2    vinuta siddhi pradanu vighnEsha dayadinda neneda kAryagaLella neravErisali 
dinadinadi dhanvantriyApattugaLa kaLedu mana haruSavavittu mannisali biDade
    caraNam 3    nirata su-jnAnavanu Iva madhvarAya gurugaLAshIrvAda namagAgali 
purandara viTTalanna karuNadindali sakala surarolume namage su-sthiravAgali
